CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c,"In Signatures"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Other Party Signatures") ), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_DocuApi__DocuSignEnvStatusByEnvId?envelopeparentid="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus_DocuApi__CheckStatus","Check eSignature Status"), "_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Check eSignature Status
